original_text: And he said to them, “Why were you looking for me? Did you not know that I must be in my Father's house?”
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 어찌하여 나를 찾으셨나이까 내가 내 아버지 집에 있어야 될 줄을 알지 못하셨나이까 하시니

sentences.original_text: Why were you looking for me?
that I must be in my Father's house?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 아버지 집에 있어야 할 것을
